item.title: Wildfire Fighters, Unmasked in Toxic Smoke, Are Getting Sick and Dying
item.description: The U.S. Forest Service has fought decades of efforts to better protect its crews — sending them into smoke without masks or warnings about the risks.

item.title: West Point Alumni Group Cancels Award Honoring Tom Hanks
item.description: The group was to bestow the Sylvanus Thayer Award on the actor, but it said it was canceling the event to focus on preparing academy cadets for the fu...

item.title: Australian Woman, Erin Patterson, Gets Life in Mushroom Murder Case
item.description: Erin Patterson was found guilty of murdering three of her husband’s relatives and trying to kill a fourth by serving them deadly mushrooms.

item.title: Trump Is Met With Mostly Boos at U.S. Open as Security Delays a Match
item.description: With the president in attendance at Arthur Ashe Stadium, the men’s final began as hundreds of people were still waiting to go through security screeni...

item.title: Millions of Londoners Brace for Transit Disruption as Tube Strike Begins
item.description: A strike on the London Underground began Sunday over pay and conditions, threatening to upend commuter journeys for most of the week.
